00012 #include "ext.h"
00013 #include "ext_obex.h"
00014 #include "ext_hashtab.h"
00015 #include "RampUnitWrap.h"
00016 
00017 static t_hashtab        *rampunit_cache = NULL;         // cache of all previously loaded rampunit bundles
00018 
00019 
00020 rampunit::rampunit(char *filename, rampunit_method_callback_type pf_callback, void *baton)
00021 {                       
00022         char                    *temppath;
00023         short                   path;                                   // pathID#
00024         long                    outtype;                                // the file type that is actually true
00025         char                    fullpath[512];                  // path and name passed on to the plug-in loader                
00026         char                    extended_filename[256]; // has file extension added
00027 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00028         CFBundleRef             bun = NULL;
00029         CFURLRef                url = NULL;
00030 #else // WIN_VERSION
00031         HANDLE                  hLib = NULL;
00032         char                    winpath[512];
00033 #endif
00034         
00035         // 0. Look for the rampunit in the cache
00036         if(rampunit_cache){
00037 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00038                 hashtab_lookup(rampunit_cache, gensym(filename), (t_object **)&bun);
00039                 if(bun)
00040 #else // WIN_VERSION
00041                 hashtab_lookup(rampunit_cache, gensym(filename), (t_object **)&hLib);
00042                 if(hLib)
00043 #endif
00044                         goto fetchpointers;
00045         }
00046         else
00047                 rampunit_cache = hashtab_new(17);
00048 
00049         // 1. Find and open the RampUnit plug-in from the searchpath
00050         strcpy(extended_filename, filename);
00051 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00052         strcat(extended_filename, ".rampunit");
00053 #else // WIN_VERSION
00054         strcat(extended_filename, ".rampdll");
00055 #endif
00056         if(locatefile_extended(extended_filename, &path, &outtype, NULL, 0)){   // Returns 0 if successful
00057                 error("rampunit: ramp unit not found");
00058                 goto out;                                                                                               // Not found
00059         }       
00060         path_topathname(path, extended_filename, fullpath);
00061 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00062         temppath = strchr(fullpath, ':');
00063         temppath += 1;
00064         
00065         url = CFURLCreateFromFileSystemRepresentation(kCFAllocatorDefault, (UInt8 *)temppath, strlen(temppath), true);
00066         if(!url){
00067                 error("pattr_setup: could not create URL for pattr-bundle");
00068                 goto out;
00069         }
00070         
00071         bun = CFBundleCreate(kCFAllocatorDefault, url);
00072         CFRelease(url);
00073         if(!bun){
00074                 error("pattr_setup: could not create BundleRef for pattr-bundle");
00075                 goto out;
00076         }
00077         
00078         CFBundleLoadExecutable(bun);    // this makes sure that the OS doesn't close our bundle automatically 
00079                                                                         // we want to keep it open for the hastab/cache optimization
00080         hashtab_store(rampunit_cache, gensym(filename), (t_object *)bun);
00081         
00082 fetchpointers:
00083         rampunit_method_create                                  = (rampunit_method_create_type)                                 CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("create"));
00084         rampunit_method_destroy                                 = (rampunit_method_destroy_type)                                CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("destroy"));
00085         rampunit_method_attrset                                 = (rampunit_method_attrset_type)                                CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("attrset"));
00086         rampunit_method_attrget                                 = (rampunit_method_attrget_type)                                CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("attrget"));
00087         rampunit_method_setFunction                             = (rampunit_method_setFunction_type)                    CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("setFunction"));
00088         rampunit_method_getFunction                             = (rampunit_method_getFunction_type)                    CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("getFunction"));
00089         rampunit_method_setFunctionParameter    = (rampunit_method_setFunctionParameter_type)   CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("setFunctionParameter"));
00090         rampunit_method_getFunctionParameter    = (rampunit_method_getFunctionParameter_type)   CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("getFunctionParameter"));
00091         rampunit_method_go                                              = (rampunit_method_go_type)                                             CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("go"));
00092         rampunit_method_set                                             = (rampunit_method_set_type)                                    CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("set"));
00093         rampunit_method_stop                                    = (rampunit_method_stop_type)                                   CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("stop"));
00094         rampunit_method_tick                                    = (rampunit_method_tick_type)                                   CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("tick"));
00095 
00096 #else // WIN_VERSION
00097         path_nameconform(fullpath, winpath, PATH_STYLE_NATIVE, PATH_TYPE_ABSOLUTE);
00098         hLib = LoadLibrary(winpath);
00099         
00100         hashtab_store(rampunit_cache, gensym(filename), (t_object *)hLib);      
00101         
00102         if(hLib){
00103 fetchpointers:
00104                 rampunit_method_create                                  = (rampunit_method_create_type)                                 GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "create");
00105                 rampunit_method_destroy                                 = (rampunit_method_destroy_type)                                GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "destroy");
00106                 rampunit_method_attrset                                 = (rampunit_method_attrset_type)                                GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "attrset");
00107                 rampunit_method_attrget                                 = (rampunit_method_attrget_type)                                GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "attrget");
00108                 rampunit_method_setFunction                             = (rampunit_method_setFunction_type)                    GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "setFunction");
00109                 rampunit_method_getFunction                             = (rampunit_method_getFunction_type)                    GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "getFunction");
00110                 rampunit_method_setFunctionParameter    = (rampunit_method_setFunctionParameter_type)   GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "setFunctionParameter");
00111                 rampunit_method_getFunctionParameter    = (rampunit_method_getFunctionParameter_type)   GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "getFunctionParameter");
00112                 rampunit_method_go                                              = (rampunit_method_go_type)                                             GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "go");
00113                 rampunit_method_set                                             = (rampunit_method_set_type)                                    GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "set");
00114                 rampunit_method_stop                                    = (rampunit_method_stop_type)                                   GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "stop");
00115                 rampunit_method_tick                                    = (rampunit_method_tick_type)                                   GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "tick");
00116         }
00117 #endif
00118 
00119         if(rampunit_method_create)
00120                 rampunit_instance = rampunit_method_create(pf_callback, baton);
00121         else{
00122 out:    
00123                 error("RampUnit creation failed!");
00124                 rampunit_instance = NULL;
00125         }
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 // Destructor
00130 rampunit::~rampunit(void)
00131 {
00132         if(rampunit_instance)
00133                 rampunit_method_destroy(rampunit_instance);
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 // Attribute Accessors
00138 ramp_err rampunit::attrset(t_symbol *attrname, double value)
00139 {
00140         ramp_err err = RAMP_ERR_GENERIC;
00141         
00142         if(rampunit_instance){
00143                 err = rampunit_method_attrset(rampunit_instance, attrname, value);
00144                 if(err){
00145                         if(err == RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID)
00146                                 error("invalid attr specified for this rampunit");
00147                         else
00148                                 error("rampunit::attrset error %i", err);
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         else
00152                 error("bad rampunit, cannot call attrset");
00153         
00154         return err;
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 ramp_err rampunit::attrget(t_symbol *attrname, double *value)
00159 {
00160         ramp_err err = RAMP_ERR_GENERIC;
00161         
00162         if(rampunit_instance){
00163                 err = rampunit_method_attrget(rampunit_instance, attrname, value);
00164                 if(err){
00165                         if(err == RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID)
00166                                 error("invalid attr specified for this rampunit");
00167                         else
00168                                 error("rampunit::attrget error %i", err);
00169                 }
00170         }
00171         else
00172                 error("bad rampunit, cannot call attrget");
00173         
00174         return err;
00175 }

00178 ramp_err rampunit::setFunction(t_symbol *functionName)
00179 {
00180         return rampunit_method_setFunction(rampunit_instance, functionName);
00181 }

00184 ramp_err rampunit::getFunction(t_symbol **functionName)

00187 }

00190 ramp_err rampunit::setFunctionParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00191 {
00192         return rampunit_method_setFunctionParameter(rampunit_instance, parameterName, argc, argv);
00193 }
00194 
00195 
00196 ramp_err rampunit::getFunctionParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00197 {
00198         return rampunit_method_getFunctionParameter(rampunit_instance, parameterName, argc, argv);
00199 }

00202 // RampUnit Methods
00203 void rampunit::go(short numvalues, double *values, double time)
00204 {
00205         if(rampunit_instance)
00206                 rampunit_method_go(rampunit_instance, numvalues, values, time);
00207         else
00208                 error("bad rampunit, cannot call go");
00209 }

00212 void rampunit::set(short numvalues, double *values)
00213 {
00214         if(rampunit_instance)
00215                 rampunit_method_set(rampunit_instance, numvalues, values);
00216         else
00217                 error("bad rampunit, cannot call set");
00218 }

00221 void rampunit::stop()

00225         else
00226                 error("bad rampunit, cannot call stop");
00227 }

00230 void rampunit::tick()

00235                 error("bad rampunit, cannot call tick");
